::: ::::: :::: {.right-column} :::: {.grid} ::: {.g-col-1} {{< fa briefcase >}} ::: ::: {.g-col-11} I am a [Research Software Engineer](https://society-rse.org/about/) at the [Centre for Advanced Research Computing](https://www.ucl.ac.uk/advanced-research-computing/advanced-research-computing-centre), University College London and have been since June 2023. I work across a range of projects from improving the performance High Performance Fortran to implementing existing workflows in sustainable python applications. Check out my [GitHub](https://github.com/connoraird) to see what I've been up to lately. ::: ::: {.g-col-1} {{< fa graduation-cap >}} ::: ::: {.g-col-11} I graduated from the University of York in 2020 with a First Class Masters Degree in Physics. My master's [dissertation](https://drive.google.com/file/d/13m-OyFQmWPne5HUc4558RDkDdu0VIjel/view?usp=sharing) focused on 1D modelling of turbulence in Tokamak fusion reactors. ::: ::: {.g-col-1} {{< fa person-swimming >}} ::: ::: {.g-col-11} In my spare time I enjoy playing [underwater hockey](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Underwater_hockey). I began playing at university before graduating to the city team, [York Octopush](https://www.yorkoctopush.org.uk/). I now train with [Islington Underwater Hockey](https://islingtonuwh.github.io/). ::: ::: {.g-col-1} {{< fa person-hiking >}} ::: ::: {.g-col-11} I love hiking around Britain. In particular, I have been trying to walk all the [Wainwright fells](https://www.walklakes.co.uk/hills/wainwrights.html). ::: :::: :::: ::::: ::::::
